content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mister Wang, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm interested in your apartment, but I need to discuss the price with you. Could you tell me the lowest rent you would consider for this apartment?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mister Wang, as you can see, this is a prime location with a lot of amenities nearby. The lowest rent I would consider is 800 Euros per month. Is this within your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 800 Euros per month is quite high for an unfurnished apartment. I'm looking for something more affordable. Could you lower the price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mister Wang, I'm sorry, but 800 Euros is the lowest I can go. The apartment's location and the recent renovations justify this price. Are you willing to pay 800 Euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate the quality of the apartment, but 800 Euros is still out of my budget. Could we negotiate a lower price? Perhaps 700 Euros?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mister Wang, I'm sorry, but I cannot reduce the price to 700 Euros. The apartment is newly built and in the city center, which justifies the 800 Euros rent. Would you be willing to pay the full price of 800 Euros?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm willing to pay 800 Euros per month if you can provide me with some additional benefits, such as a longer lease term or help with the utility setup. Would that be possible?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mister Wang, additional benefits are not negotiable. The price of 800 Euros per month is final for the apartment as it stands. Would you like to proceed with the rent at this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your position. Since the price is non-negotiable, I will consider your offer. However, I would like to take a few days to think about it. Could we perhaps come back to this discussion later?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mister Wang, I'm willing to give you some time to consider my offer. We can discuss this further at a later date. Please let me know when you've made your decision.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your understanding. I will get back to you with my decision as soon as possible. Thank you for your time.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mister Wang, you're welcome. I look forward to your decision. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact me. Good day to you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. Good day to you as well. I'll be in touch soon.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Mister Wang. I hope to hear from you soon. Good day!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Good day, Mister Schmidt. I've considered your offer and I'm ready to proceed with the rent at 800 Euros per month. I'm also interested in a longer lease term if that's possible. Could we discuss the terms further?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mister Wang, excellent news! I'm glad to hear that you're ready to proceed with the rent at 800 Euros per month. Regarding the lease term, I can offer you a standard 12-month lease. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, a 12-month lease is acceptable to me. I'm pleased to have reached an agreement on the rent and the lease term. Can we proceed with the paperwork?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mister Wang, we can indeed proceed with the paperwork. Once you've signed the lease, we can arrange a date for you to move in. Is there anything else we need to discuss before we finalize the agreement?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I believe we have covered all the important aspects of the agreement. I'm ready to sign the lease as soon as you provide it. Thank you for your cooperation throughout this process.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mister Wang, you're welcome. I'll prepare the lease and send it to you for signature. Once you've signed it and returned it to me, we'll set a move-in date. Thank you for choosing my apartment. I'm sure you'll be very happy here. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
